ModMetaData.name: [RH] Faction: Coalition
ModMetaData.author: Chicken Plucker
ModMetaData.description:
The Coalition is a multinational alliance that consists of operators from the UKSF, Warcom and Demon Dogs. After years of war with the Allegiance, there came a cease fire between their troops to take down a mechanoid invasion.
Credits to: Dninemfive - 1.2 update solutions Saito Yui - TraderKinds.xml coding assistance Mehni - 1.1 backpacks.dll update Ods and BajtMe - For help with awesome apparel textures Jecrell, Jdalt40, dninemfive and Spdskatr - For C# coding assistance and patches
